__TOC__

TheVeech is supposedly a good writer. He has a degree in Linguistics and Literature and has had training in both Journalism and Lecturing.

He occasionally conducts independent campaigns advocating FLOSS and open standards. For example, he recently lobbied the UK Parliament on the use of restricted formats in the online delivery of broadcast content by Public Service Broadcasters.

TheVeech resides in the UK and is a member of the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-uk|Ubuntu UK Community]]</nowiki>
